videos.headline: B. Mayfield sacked by C. Watkins for -6 yds
videos.description: Baker Mayfield sacked by Carlos Watkins for a loss of 6 yards to the Okla 19

videos.headline: S. Perine run for 17 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Samaje Perine run for 17 yds to the Okla 45 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: B. Mayfield pass,to M. Andrews for 21 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Baker Mayfield pass complete to Mark Andrews for 21 yds to the Clem 1 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Pass Interference Call Extends Oklahoma's Opening Drive
videos.description: Pass Interference Call Extends Oklahoma's Opening Drive

videos.headline: Perine punches it in for first touchdown of game
videos.description: Oklahoma RB Samaje Perine scores from a yard out to give the Sooners a 7-0 lead over the Clemson Tigers in the Capital One Orange Bowl.

videos.headline: B. Mayfield sacked by S. Lawson for -14 yds
videos.description: Baker Mayfield sacked by Shaq Lawson for a loss of 14 yards to the Okla 4

videos.headline: Deshaun Watson absorbs contact and rushes forward for a gain of 3 yards and a Clemson first down
videos.description: Deshaun Watson absorbs contact and rushes forward for a gain of 3 yards and a Clemson first down

videos.headline: Greg Huegel 26 Yd Field Goal
videos.description: Greg Huegel 26 Yd Field Goal

videos.headline: Clemson DE Shaq Lawson with ice on his knee
videos.description: Clemson DE Shaq Lawson with ice on his knee

videos.headline: Watson scrambles for 46 yards
videos.description: With the ball deep in their own territory, Clemson QB evades pressure and runs downfield for a 46-yard gain.

videos.headline: Clemson executes perfect fake punt
videos.description: Clemson punter Andy Teasdall connects with Christian Wilkins for the first down and then some.

videos.headline: D. Watson run for 5 yds for a TD, (G. Huegel KICK)
videos.description: Deshaun Watson run for 5 yds for a TD (Greg Huegel KICK)

videos.headline: G. Huegel 36 yd FG GOOD
videos.description: Greg Huegel 36 yd FG GOOD

videos.headline: Sooners' fan in disbelief over Clemson's fake punt
videos.description: Oklahoma was hurt by Clemson's fake punt, but this Sooners' fan may have taken the brunt of it.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Sooners' fan in disbelief over Clemson's fake punt) 2015/12/31 PVC

videos.headline: B. Mayfield pass,to S. Shepard for 27 yds for a 1ST down,CLEMSON penalty, Sideline Interference (15 Yards) for a 1ST down
videos.description: Baker Mayfield pass complete to Sterling Shepard for 27 yds to the CLEMSON 44 for a 1ST down CLEMSON Penalty, Sideline Interference (15 Yards) to the Clem 29 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Austin Seibert 22 Yd Field Goal
videos.description: Austin Seibert 22 Yd Field Goal

videos.headline: Greg Huegel 43 Yd Field Goal
videos.description: Greg Huegel 43 Yd Field Goal

videos.headline: Clemson's creative play calling leads to TD
videos.description: Early in the second quarter, the Tigers convert a fake punt on fourth down, then run some trickeration on a run play, which leads to 5-yard touchdown from Deshaun Watson.

videos.headline: B. Mayfield pass,to S. Perine for 20 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Baker Mayfield pass complete to Samaje Perine for 20 yds to the Okla 44 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Mayfield hits Westbrook for huge gain to the red zone
videos.description: Oklahoma's Baker Mayfield goes deep to Dede Westbrook for the 42-yard gain to put Oklahoma in business at the Clemson 11 yard line.

videos.headline: Andrews slips into the end zone giving Sooners the lead back
videos.description: Mark Andrews catches the pass in the flat, puts on the brakes to get by a defender, and then scampers into the end zone to put Oklahoma back in front at 17-16.

videos.headline: Clemson drive ends with pick in the end zone
videos.description: On third-and-eight in the final seconds of the first half, Deshaun Watson tries to find Jordan Leggett but it's picked off by Oklahoma's Zach Sanchez in the end zone to keep the Sooners in front at half time.

videos.headline: Z. Brooks run for 18 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Zac Brooks run for 18 yds to the Okla 20 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Gallman puts Clemson back on top with 1-yard run
videos.description: Clemson's Wayne Gallman goes in from 1-yard out to finish off the opening driving of the third quarter with a touchdown to put the Tigers back in front 23-17.

videos.headline: Samaje Perine Leaves Game with Injury
videos.description: Samaje Perine Leaves Game with Injury

videos.headline: B. Mayfield sacked by K. Dodd for -9 yds
videos.description: Baker Mayfield sacked by Kevin Dodd for a loss of 9 yards to the Okla 9

videos.headline: Nailed It/Failed It: Clemson Punter
videos.description: Clemson punter Andy Teasdall redeems his ACC Championship Game blunder with a fake punt conversion in the CFP semifinal.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Clemson Punter Failed/Nailed It) 2015/12/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wayne Gallman Gashes the Sooners Defense for 13 yards
videos.description: Wayne Gallman Gashes the Sooners Defense for 13 yards

videos.headline: G. Huegel 47 yd FG MISSED
videos.description: Greg Huegel 47 yd FG MISSED

videos.headline: D. Westbrook run for 19 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Dede Westbrook run for 19 yds to the Okla 49 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Oklahoma RB Joe Mixon leaves game with injury
videos.description: Oklahoma RB Joe Mixon leaves game with injury

videos.headline: Clemson stuffs Perine on fourth-and-short
videos.description: With Oklahoma driving and facing a fourth-and-one  in Clemson territory, Samaje Perine takes the direct snap but the Tigers were ready for it and stop him short for a turnover on downs.

videos.headline: W. Gallman run for 21 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Wayne Gallman run for 21 yds to the Okla 49 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Renfrow extends Clemson's lead to 30-17
videos.description: Clemson's Deshaun Watson hits Hunter Renfrow who shakes a defender and strolls into the end zone to give the Tigers their biggest lead of the game at 30-17.

videos.headline: B. Mayfield run for 18 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Baker Mayfield run for 18 yds to the Clem 40 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Clemson INT stalls another Oklahoma drive
videos.description: For the second consecutive drive, Oklahoma gets into Clemson territory and comes away with nothing as B.J. Goodson picks off Baker Mayfield at the 29 yard line.

videos.headline: Oklahoma fan can feel it slipping away
videos.description: A young Oklahoma fan reacts to Clemson taking a 13-point lead over the Sooners.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Oklahoma fan can feel it slipping away) 2015/12/31 PVC

videos.headline: B. Mayfield sacked by B. Boulware and A. Bryant for -5 yds
videos.description: Baker Mayfield sacked by Ben Boulware and Austin Bryant for a loss of 5 yards to the Okla 13

videos.headline: Gallman's 2nd TD has Clemson running away
videos.description: Clemson's Wayne Gallman punches it in from four yards out for his second touchdown of the game to bump the Tigers lead up to 37-17.

videos.headline: Oklahoma RB Samaje Perine leaves game for second time with injury
videos.description: Oklahoma RB Samaje Perine leaves game for second time with injury

videos.headline: B. Mayfield pass,to D. Neal for 17 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Baker Mayfield pass complete to Durron Neal for 17 yds to the Clem 32 for a 1ST down

videos.headline: Oklahoma picked off in the red zone
videos.description: Baker Mayfield pass intercepted Ben Boulware return for 9 yds to the Clem 11

videos.headline: Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield Leaves Game with Injury
videos.description: Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield Leaves Game with Injury

videos.headline: Deshaun Watson Throws Ball into Stands to End Game
videos.description: Deshaun Watson Throws Ball into Stands to End Game

videos.headline: Shepard: 'We couldn't get things rolling'
videos.description: Sterling Shepard is disappointed when talking to Sam Ponder after Oklahoma's loss to Clemson in the Capital One Orange Bowl.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Sterling Shepard After Orange Bowl) 2015/12/31 SC
